Cron job and webhook¶

If you use Bambu Cron you can install this cron job (just like any other supported by Bambu Cron) to delete orphaned attachments. This fires a webhook which you can manage by setting up Bambu Webhooks to do just about anything you want with it.

Installation¶

Once you’ve installed Bambu Attachments, make sure to run manage.py cron --setup so that Bambu Cron can pick up the Attachments cron job.
